options.title: -m, --mode=MODE
options.description: set file mode (as in chmod), not a=rwx - umask

options.title: -m, --mode=MODE
options.description: set file mode (as in chmod), not a=rwx - umask

options.title: -p, --parents
options.description: no error if existing, make parent directories as needed, with their file modes unaffected by any -m option.

options.title: -p, --parents
options.description: no error if existing, make parent directories as needed, with their file modes unaffected by any -m option.

options.title: -v, --verbose
options.description: print a message for each created directory

options.title: -v, --verbose
options.description: print a message for each created directory

options.title: -Z
options.description: set SELinux security context of each created directory to the default type

options.title: --context[=CTX]
options.description: like -Z, or if CTX is specified then set the SELinux or SMACK security context to CTX
